Package tsinn.ui

This contains the classes and interfaces for creating a simple graphical program that is based on JavaFX.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Animatable
    Animatable is the interface that all classes must implement if they with the BaseApp to update them any time the BaseApp is animating.
    Drawable
    Drawable interface that all classes must implement if they wish to be drawn via a BaseAppVisual
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnotherExample  
    BaseApp
    BaseApp is the abstract base class for all visual applications.
    BaseAppVisual
    BaseAppVisual is the the class that is responsible for displaying a BaseApp and any of that BaseApp's Drawable content.
    Example
    An example program that extends BaseApp and implements both Drawable and Animatable.
    SimpleApp  

Package tsinn.ui Description

This contains the classes and interfaces for creating a simple graphical program that is based on JavaFX. To use it, simply extend BaseApp and have your app's main call launch() You can then add Drawable things to your app and they will be drawn by the BaseAppVisual.
Author:
Timothy Sinnott
